name: world-tester
description: AI-powered QA tester agent that interacts with web applications using Stagehand and Gemini

scripts.release: docker compose down && docker compose up --build -d
scripts.release:vnc: VNC=true docker compose down && VNC=true docker compose up --build -d
scripts.release:interactive:vnc: (while ! nc -z localhost 5900 2>/dev/null; do sleep 1; done && npm run vnc) & VNC=true docker compose run --rm --build --service-ports app
scripts.vnc: command -v vncviewer >/dev/null 2>&1 && vncviewer localhost:5900 || echo 'vncviewer not found. Install it: sudo apt install tigervnc-viewer'
scripts.postinstall: prisma generate && npx playwright install chromium
